head.supplied: 11/8/93. ¶ ¶ I am almost ashamed to write these lines to you, dear Dr Bride, but would venture to ask, whether the small amount for the Columbus-publication will be possibly soon available; but — pra...

div.p: VPRS 805/P000O/173/93-1171, inward and outward correspondence — subject, VA 913 Public Library of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I am almost ashamed to write these lines to you, dear Dr Bride, but would venture to ask, whether the small amount for the Columbus-publication will be possibly soon available; but — pray — do not go about this to any inconvenience. A variety of expenses for books and other science-material is just coming on me, so that any little amount will help to clear off current accounts.
MS annotation: 'Account paid 22.8.93'. See also M to T. Bride, 22 August 1893.
